abstract: Opportunities for a Better Tomorrow, beneficiary agency of Community Service Society of New York, one of the agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Celeste Lawton get job training.
lead_paragraph: Celeste Lawton was so occupied with her sick mother’s needs that she ended up leaving high school. Now she’s working hard to provide for her own daughter.

headline.main: A Selfless Caretaker, First as a Daughter, Now as a Mother
headline.print_headline: A Selfless Caretaker, First for Her Mother, and Now as a Mother Herself

snippet: Celeste Lawton was so occupied with her sick mother’s needs that she ended up leaving high school. Now she’s working hard to provide for her own daughter.
